Welcome!

eLearning MadeEasy was developed as part of the Univerity College Cork 4th Year Computer Science Project. The aim of the work is to facilitate simple and convenient eLearning experiences. The flagship of the eLearning offerings was provided by Cork University Hospital Radiology Department, and is aimed at Radiology practitioners and students to provide a more interactive and dynamic learning experience. The app also contains some tools which can be used by practitioners to calculate various different metrics used within Radiology. \nThank you for taking the time to use the app and please feel free to offer feedback, areas for improvement and donate.
